description:
It turns out that White dudes for Harris are not for Hispanics.

“Your Hispanic parents want to be white,” one teacher told his student as he could not accept Kamala’s defeat.

Given this painfully racist and inappropriate statement, parents went off at the school board.


BREAKING: Parents WENT OFF on the California public school teacher who had a meltdown in class after Trump won.

They said he "made the most racist comment" and "should be FIRED." Parents are "offended," "put [the school board] on notice " & MORE.

I have the video.
Buckle up👇🧵
— Corey A. DeAngelis, school choice evangelist (@DeAngelisCorey) November 13, 2024
title: Parents Go Off On Teacher Who Went On Racist Rant And Bullied Students After Trump Win

description:
The side that claims to include all people in all things has gone so far off the deep end that a “trustee and PR director of Britain’s oldest breastfeeding charity has resigned after it introduced an inclusivity policy that allowed men to attend support groups.”

In other words, a woman was forced to resign because she refused to allow a baby to suck on a grown man's nipples. And it is not possible to make that level of insanity up.


'A trustee of Britain’s oldest breastfeeding charity has resigned after it introduced an inclusivity policy that allowed men to attend support groups.'
Can we talk about the fetishists yet? Or must we turn a blind eye, lest we seem prudish, or unkind?https://t.co/Uulae6dE9j
title: Trustee Forced To Resign Over For Opposing (Trans) Men Attending Breastfeeding Support Groups

description:
Squirrel lives matter.

The signs the government has become too massive is that they waste loads of resources kidnapping American citizens' pets for reasons that will never be justified, while they house foreign nationals solely because they have broken federal immigration laws.

I am sure you have heard about the two murders of Peanut the Squirrel and Fred the Raccoon. The government claimed this was only because they had to test for rabies after Peanut defended his territory from these evil monsters. However, it turned out that that was a massive lie and they planned to kill these two wonderful creatures a week before they even kidnapped them.

This squirrel named Peanut was inseparable from his beloved owner, who rescued him 7 years ago.

Peanut b
title: New York officials ordered Peanut the Squirrel’s assassination A WEEK before he was squirrel-napped

description:
Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy will lead the Department of Government Efficiency to protect Americans from the government wasting insane amounts of money. Today’s show breaks it down.

The government needs a task force dedicated to stopping bearcats from wasting large amounts of cash for a far worse reason than you think.

- YouTube
title: Let That Sink In! Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy Form New Trump Super Team

description:
The first, for lack of a better word, "controversial" cabinet pick from Donald Trump is naming Pete Hegseth as his Secretary of Defense. "Controversial" in the sense that he isn't a career bureaucrat and is ONLY a decorated Yale and Harvard-educated twenty-year combat veteran who is the CEO of a Veterans advocacy organization. Oh, and he is (or was) a host on Fox News. That's where the "controversy" comes in for CNN. Who, if they didn't watch Fox News and complain about it, wouldn't have much else to talk about.

Scott Jennings was NOT having any of it. The lone voice of sanity on "the most trusted name in news" drew comparisons to Joe Biden's "expert" pick. Unlike Biden, Jennings could remember Lloyd Austin's name as something other than "
title: Scott Jennings gives BLISTERING defense of "Fox News guy" Pete Hegseth being appointed by Trump

description:
There's not much to do this week other than wait for Donald Trump to making cabinet picks and revel it leftists having meltdowns over their Trump supporting family members. Then, when Trump makes a pick, revel in the meltdown over his choice of a Fox News host to head up the Department of Defense or Elon Musk to head up the Department of Memes. As we wait for today's offerings on the altar of content, please enjoy Van Jones opining on how much it sucks to be a Democrat right now.

Note the use of finger quotes around the word "meltdown" in the title. This isn't like we've been seeing from the shrill harpies on "The View." Van Jones had his tongue embedded
title: Van Jones has HILARIOUS "meltdown" over how much it sucks to be a Democrat these days

description:
